name: Yaxche
description:
The four Ceiba trees planted at each corner of the world are gathering the souls of those who died. At the center of the world stands Yaxche, a giant tree whose foundations delves deep into the underworld, and whose branches pierces the heaven.

The souls must now safely reach and climb Yaxche to gain acces to the heaven. Connect the roots of each Ceiba with the central tree to help them find rest.
